scripts.build:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace RtnDevConsoleExample.xcworkspace -scheme RtnDevConsoleExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator CC=clang CPLUSPLUS=clang++ LD=clang LDPLUSPLUS=clang++ GCC_OPTIMIZATION_LEVEL=0 GCC_PRECOMPILE_PREFIX_HEADER=YES ASSETCATALOG_COMPILER_OPTIMIZATION=time DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT=dwarf COMPILER_INDEX_STORE_ENABLE=NO
scripts.pod-install-fabric: cd ios && NO_FLIPPER=1 USE_FRAMEWORKS=static RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod-install-legacy: cd ios && USE_FRAMEWORKS=static RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 bundle exec pod install
scripts.dev-nuke: rm -rf ../yarn.lock && yarn && yarn pod-install && yarn ios
